replies.body:
I'll take this; the other answer aren't so accurate.  This is the PBE.  As explained along the way, it's the area for players to assist and work with Riot, it's not the same as the general consumer servers.  It has different standards being a different situation.  Your actions there results in a permanent ban without appeal.
There is not anything unusual about what happened.

That's a pretty grievous offense, but I would've expected a 14-day for an account with no prior actions against it. Therefore, I suspect that there have been prior actions against your account, and you're either deliberately keeping them from us (I've seen it before) or you didn't log in during your previous punishment (I've seen that before, too).
Added a link so you can see it wasn't my first.
